channel.title: Postgresql on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore
channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on Plakar | The Open Standard for Backup and Restore

item.title: Researching a PostgreSQL viewer for Plakar
item.description: An R&D exploration of adding a PostgreSQL viewer to the Plakar UI, comparing filesystem-based approaches with block-level copy-on-write using qcow2.
